arts.ttl: Marco Silva seeks to ‘balance things’ on derby day despite Chelsea’s financial clout
arts.sum: Marco Silva spoke about what the West London derby means to him as Fulham face Chelsea at Stamford Bridge this weekend. Off the pitch is a completely different world.

arts.ttl: Silva expresses Fulham transfer frustration, delivers injury update ahead of Chelsea clash
arts.sum: Fulham manager Marco Silva expresses his frustration over the club's lack of transfer business, while he also delivers an injury update ahead of Saturday's Premier League clash with Chelsea.

arts.ttl: Chelsea vs Fulham Preview: Premier League, Gameweek 3, 2025
arts.sum: In fact, both matches between the pair were decided in injury time last season, as Pedro Neto struck late to win it at Craven Cottage. Chelsea's last defeat at home did, in fact, come at the hands of Fulham on Boxing Day, where Rodrigo Muniz won it in injury time.

arts.ttl: Harry Wilson: Beating Chelsea 'means that extra bit more'
arts.sum: “But we know we’re going to have to be at the top of our game, because Chelsea showed in the summer, winning the Club World Cup, what a fantastic team they are.” “They had an amazing win last Friday against West Ham, so we know it’s going to be a really tough game, but we know that if we play to the levels we’re capable of then we’ll be able to get a result.”

arts.ttl: Chelsea Predicted Lineup vs. Fulham: Delap Continues As Injured Palmer Misses Out
arts.sum: Enzo Maresca’s Blues thrashed West Ham last time out but now want bragging rights in west London.

arts.ttl: Chelsea boss Maresca provides Palmer injury update ahead of Fulham derby showdown
arts.sum: Chelsea head coach Enzo Maresca reveals whether Cole Palmer has recovered from a groin injury in time to face Fulham in the Premier League on Saturday afternoon.

arts.ttl: Alexander-Arnold and Grealish left out of England squad
arts.sum: Elliot Anderson earns a first senior England nod after dazzling for Forest and Under-21s. Rashford and Wharton return; Foden also left out by Tuchel.

arts.ttl: "This game matters for the identity of the club" | Chelsea v Fulham | THE PREVIEW
arts.sum: For our first ever in-person preview, Elizabeth is joined by Chelsea fan Teddy to look forward to the SW6 derby at Stamford Bridge on Saturday.

arts.ttl: Chelsea v Fulham predicted line-ups + FPL team news
